page.title: 14Day in My Life - Parent 2
page.content: After sending the kids back to school, mopping up puddles, making beds and putting clothes away I went to school to meet with the teachers as it was the day for parents. I had a great chat with Mrs McQuade who will be visiting my homeland, America, this summer. I also met and chatted with 4 parents for the first time which was great for me as we are fairly new to the area. I got home in time to prepare tea (main meal) of brisket, potatoes and peas, celery and pickled onion. My husband was off to a prayer meeting, the children played outside so I watched a chat show and read the paper. The big news of the day was the American President's health. They are concerned that he may not be able to finish the remainder of his 3 years in office.
